text: Listed below is the general specifications about the Hotel room  Nehru Trophy Finishing Point is 1.7 miles from the accommodation, while Mullakkal Rajarajeswari Temple is 2.6 miles away. The nearest airport is Cochin International, 51 miles from Malayalam Lake Resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.  Located in Alleppey, 1.7 miles from Nehru Trophy Boat Race, Malayalam Lake Resort provides accommodations with a restaurant, private parking and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms.

What was the price for what it is?
utterance.kb: The room itself was fine. But the lobby is unwelcoming and the hallways are not very clean. Also, the TV is complicated to get working properly. I had to go back down to the lobby to ask someone to come and help me get it working - and they never bothered to come - so I had to figure it out on my own. Expensive for what it is.

utterance.nlg: Expensive for what it is.

utterance.nlg: What did the frontdesk say was a problem?
utterance.kb: Bad hotel where should I start...First we came in at 12:30 am this was no problem but then nobody spoke English. We thought this could happen because it was midnight and English staff is hard to find. Then we went to the room and this whas not at all what we expected or payed for. The room was as small as a closet the shower was dirty and small so was the whole bathroom en our window whas a inside window with a vieuw in the lobby! Because we arrived late we diden't want to go downstairs again to tell them about this.Next day we went down to complain about the window, small room and dirty bathroom. When we told the frontdesk nobody understood us it took us an hour to explain and once they understood they said that it was hour problem and if we want a room with window ect. then we should pay more...Besides all of this they show pictures of the restaurant witch they don't even have. They had this restaurant 4 years ago now they you can eat in the poor lobby.Conclusion:Don't go here for the same money you can go to Novehotel and book a room without a window (at least they inform you).
